mapper.sql: id, keyName, keyValue,explain, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_deleted

mapper.update:
update t_system_setup
keyName = #{keyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
keyValue = #{keyvalue,jdbcType=INTEGER},
explain = #{explain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_system_setup set keyName = #{keyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keyValue = #{keyvalue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, explain = #{explain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select keyValue from t_system_setup where keyName = #{auditSwitch} and is_deleted = 0
select t.id,t.keyName,t.keyValue,t.explain from t_system_setup t where t.keyName in ('okSwitch','ngSwitch')
